features.dailyDiscussionsDesc: Exchange knowledge about threats, tools and security techniques
features.bestPracticesDesc: Share everyday experiences and learn from the community
features.eventsOpportunitiesDesc: Stay up to date with events, job openings and industry initiatives

guidelines.title: Community Guidelines
guidelines.description: We maintain a collaborative environment focused on learning. Share knowledge, ask questions, promote relevant events and together let's build a strong and engaged cybersecurity community.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Café com Cyber is an initiative dedicated to democratizing knowledge in Information Security. Our mission is to create a collaborative space where professionals, enthusiasts and students can share experiences, learn together and strengthen the cybersecurity community in Brazil.
